tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP John)) (VP (VBD saw) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJ holy) (NN city) (NNP New) (NNP Jerusalem)) (VP (VBG coming) (PRT (RP down)) (ADVP (IN out))) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (NN heaven)) (PP (IN from) (NP (NNP God))))) (: ...) (NP (NN Rev) (CD 21:2))))))
